channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [RAVE-746] Cannot change preferences through admin interface
item.description:
Log in as canonical
Go to admin interface
Go to preferences
Click on one of the preferences to edit
Result is an error page

Stacktrace:

item.summary: Cannot change preferences through admin interface

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
